glsa.title: sendmail: X.509 NULL spoofing vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: An error in the hostname matching in sendmail might enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: sendmail is a widely-used Mail Transport Agent (MTA).

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in sendmail. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections made using sendmail.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All sendmail users should upgrade to the latest version:
